```{r}
library(DESeq2)
```

```{r}
fc <- readRDS("counts_ONT.RDS")
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData=  fc$counts[,1:6], 
                              colData = data.frame(
                                group = rep(c("H1975", "HCC827"), c(3,3))
                              ),
                              design = ~group)
```
